Author: corleto
Title: COINDASH - Future of trading - Token Sale 17th July 2017
Body: I keep coming back to this topic to hope to read something constructive. News, or otherwise useful information or announcements. However I have to go through pages and pages of flaming, name-calling, and requests to undo the ICO. I would also like my eth back. But this is not going to happen. Let's focus on the future and hope the Coindash project will amount to something somewhere in the future.  I am aware of my newbie forum status, however, if I can make a suggestion: would it be possible to have a separate thread for people wanting to vent their frustration, sadness, desire for a refund etc. ? In this way if there is any actual news or announcement other people don't have to go through 20 pages of hate to see 1 useful announcement. Or even more, miss it because of the same reason.  I wish all the best for all the people who got hit by this, both the so called whitelisters and the people who sent to the hacked address.

Author: orpel
Title: COINDASH - Future of trading - Token Sale 17th July 2017
Body: I truly believe that both dev's and contributors suffered and still suffering from this situation.  As of my point of view- I contributed to this project with the deep understanding that this is a serious talented team and they have a great product that meets many of the investors in the altcoins world needs. After this hacking incident, I still believe and nothing has changed. Yes, we won't see 1000% profit in the next few months. But I truly believe that in a year every contributor that will stay part of this project will enjoy the profit of his contribution.  I don't understand why some users here are trying to kill the product and the token value. You only hurt yourself (assuming you really contributed during the ICO). It's our interest to leave this hack behind us as soon as we can (and I know it's hard) and help the team rebuilt its credibility in the altcoins investors community as hard as it sounds.   Think about it before you keep on killing this project and all of the contributors' community money.

Author: CoinDash HQ
Title: COINDASH - Future of trading - Token Sale 17th July 2017
Body: CoinDashers  Due to our inability to simultaneously service community members in many different social networks and communication outlets, CoinDash's Bitcointalk thread is now temporarily closed.  We invite our community members to transfer the current discussion to our slack channel which will remain open and serviced by our CoinDash team around the clock.  #Announcement channel will provide constant update from CoinDash team #General channel will be reopened to the community  We apologize for the inconvenience but would like to focus the discussion in a single channel. We ask you to keep a civil and productive discussion in the general Slack channel

Author: Motivator
Title: COINDASH - Future of trading - Token Sale 17th July 2017
Body: You're incompetent to secure your website. You're incompetent to find the best solution for your company. You're incompetent to listen to your community. You ignore and continue to ignore any solution and stick by with the same phrase of ""we can't give only some an opportunity to draw back and leave the others depending on their mercy". This is your sucker line which you're praying people listen to and jump on board with you. We can see straight through it.  The people who sent it to the fake/hacker address are not being left on their mercy at all. If you actually open your eyes you will see there have been multiple options for you to consider regarding this.  - Provide the option to whitelist participants for ETH refund, since you have their fucking ETH! (If you provide the second option, then this option wouldn't be used as much) - Burn either all tokens that have been refunded OR burn Half and use the other as rewards for those who sent it to the hacker address OR use all the tokens from the refund to distribute to those who sent to hacker. - Or maybe host another token sale to get the supporters you need, rather than the current ones that have lost trust in you. (After the ETH refund of course).   Devs you really do have a bad background project development in terms of scams and hacks... and with this happening it's honestly not looking good at all. You supposedly scammed many in getgems aswell as paykey, as that's what alot have been saying and linking threads too.     My friend was involved in this tokensale so I want to help him as much as possible aswell, and all this shit storm is bad for ETH in general since it tarnishes crypto from non-stop news articles relating to how "crypto" is used to scam which it's not!

Author: CoinDash HQ
Title: COINDASH - Future of trading - Token Sale 17th July 2017
Body: CoinDashers  These are very difficult times for us. We obviously lost your confidence, we have been accused of being thieves and suffered thousands of personal insults. But regardless of that we are still here. We can't control your thoughts and believes but only ask you to hear us out. We did a mistake, a mistake that cost us dearly and damaged a work spreaded over almost an entire year. mentally speaking this is a blow that not everyone can handle but we are all still here trying to make things right. What exactly happened during the hack is still being investigated as we speak, both by cyber security authorities and private 3rd party hired by the company. when we will get the reports with the findings so does you.  We have considered several ways to continue from here. Unfortunately for some here, refunds are off the table. We currently hold approximately half of the amount that was contributed to the project. We are taking full responsibility of the situation and can't ignore some of the community that invested into the hacker address. Everyone will get the tokens they intended to get at first place. This is what we committed to do and this is what will happen. The exact distribution method is being finalized and hopefully announced today.  We were blessed with your support for almost a year. The last two days had been a nightmare for us and above all we lost your confidence. We are all here for the long run and are devoted to do whatever it takes to gain your trust again and protecting your contribution value. No matter what the hack investigation will come up with, we obviously made a mistake securing our site during the sale. Our product is still intact and is still running. If you believed it before there is no real reason for it to stop now. If we want to fully recover we need you to stay with us and get this token its true value back again. The token price will fall only if you stop believing and hurry to get rid of it. so it is really up to you now.  Hopefully with your support we can put this unfortunate mistake behind and continue our journey.  Thanks

Author: BitPotus
Title: COINDASH - Future of trading - Token Sale 17th July 2017
Body: QUOTED FROM:  https://www.reddit.com/r/ethtrader/comments/6nrxk5/never_miss_an_ico_again_coindash_cdt/      "I should note that I very nearly did not redeploy my ICO Buyer contract for the CoinDash crowdsale.  In reviewing their crowdsale code, I found multiple bugs and many errors. I've been ignored since I brought up the problems with the CoinDash team three days ago.  The Coindash team also haven't implemented any smart contract logic for their whitelist.  They're planning on keeping the contract address secret, then emailing it out 20 minutes early to those on the whitelist.  This is a huge security issue.  The most clear issue is that it doesn't give the community time to review the contract's verified source code and make sure there isn't a security hole prior to the sale.  I also suggested and was willing to provide an ENS name for free to mitigate some of the risk of fake address scams (which will be prevalent, as people can just claim to be on the whitelist), but the CoinDash ignored me on that point as well.  Overall, I'm very disappointed with the CoinDash team.  The only reason I'm still redeploying is that users in my slack expressed interest despite the problems."   YOU FUCKING FAGGOTS WERE WARNED THAT YOUR SECURITY WAS SHIT.  YOU ARE GUILTY OF GROSS NEGLIGENCE.  REFUND THE FUCKING ETH NOW  FUCKING SCAMMING CUNTS!!!

Body: Option no2 - you really think doing this coin will open above ico price? - not a chance.  This option is being pushed by people on the whitelist.  Plus say 80% ask for refund then the team have little money to develop the project effectively making the Cdt distributed effectively worthless and the project dead. This simply will not happen.  You could look at this another way. Anyone on whitelist got their tokens already so keep them. Whitelisted contributors were the ones who helped the team along the way so surely they would be more likely to believe in the project and opt to keep their tokens.   coindash could give extra % of tokens that make up for the hack.  For those who sent to fake address refubd them their eth if they want it or give them tokens if they want that (plus extra tokens same as I've said above). This would depend on the % of people who wanted refund since the amount sent to fake address is more than the whitelisted amount. Everyone on whitelist will say no to this as it doesn't favour them.  Not trying to create an argument just pointing out that if given an option both fake address and whitelist contributors would want a refund.  Only 1 thing can and will happen, everyone will get cdt tokens (possibly a higher % than they were meant to get), this will allow the team to keep the eth and try and develop the project.  I really do not see any other viable option here to keep the project alive, and to be fair on both fake and whitelist contributors.

Body: Ha ha thats the joke of the year   Seriously guys if i would have invested a bigger amount to that coin (i personly stept out because of CEO's history) i would send them an offical email today and an offical letter by a lawyer by mail that i want a full refund. This means by law Coinsdash is forced to refund your money if you demand it. However to do so you need to inform them directly about it so you can proof it in court. After they get the email and a letter from your lawyer i'm pretty sure they will refund you silently because a court case would be the least what they want since first they would loose the case and it would create costs second the result would be made public since court cases are public and there would be instantly a mass run against that company and third the bad press which they can't take anymore. Author: SmokeJoe
Title: COINDASH - Future of trading - Token Sale 17th July 2017
Body: There were two possible scenarios.  1. Everyone (white listers and those that got scammed) get the token that is worthless and only after many months might be worth a bit (but probably still below ICO price).  2. White list would get possibility of instant refund (which they might agree to or they might keep their tokens) that would instantly boost confidence in the project and make CDT valuable and priced above the ICO. Those who sent to the scammy address would get CDT that would be valued above the ICO. Everyone would profit and everyone would be happy.  Now, because people who were not on the white list didn't want second option because they do not understand how things work, everyone will be bag holder of worthless token. And everyone could profit if we pushed for first option. Congratulations to those who were scammed who took away the profit from everyone including themselves. You deserve it now. Congratulations to those who were not white listed and yet understood the other option was better to go with.

Author: john312
Title: COINDASH - Future of trading - Token Sale 17th July 2017
Body: It is really simple - just set the smart contract that sends ETH to everyone who sends CDT into it. When those who want to use the contract do it, you can continue the development of the project (and send CDT to people who were promised it like bounty hunters or people who sent to the hacker address). This way you are sure that there wont be any absurd because only people who already own the CDT will be able to use the contract. And do it quick because the longer you wait the worse it is for the project.

Author: Praxis
Title: COINDASH - Future of trading - Token Sale 17th July 2017
Body: Responsible journalism would add "alleged" or "supposed" to the "hacker", because we don't actually know that there was a hacker involved. "Inside job" seems far more likely to me. We have no proof of either, so we can only speak of possibilities. Most "hacks" in this world are either social engineering, or inside jobs. But the easiest thing is to blame an "unnamed hacker". Probably from Russia!

Author: whale123
Title: COINDASH - Future of trading - Token Sale 17th July 2017
Body: To summarize  1. There are two groups of people here. One is people who invested in the white contract (through white list, because they were selected from the community, or because the got the ICO address from someone else). Second group is people who got scammed (because they trusted the Slackbot and send on the wrong address or because they have used wrong address provided by hacker on the hacked webiste, without even checking if it is contract address and not wallet address).  2. Yes, devs had poor security of both Slack and website. But scammed people didn't even check when they are sending the funds.  3. Devs decided to be kind enough to send free tokens even to those people who were vistims of the scams (I understand only the website scam, not the Slack scam, but who knows). Also the people who sent the ETH to the right address might have an option to send their tokens back and get refunded (probably only some people will use this possibility, the rest will not).  Situation is really simple. This mess could be fixed in matter of hours. Scammed people would be grateful that despite they deserved nothing for their mistake of not checking where they are sengidn, they would be sending token anyway. And white list people who sent the coins to the right address would feel secure that if they want they can keep the coins or return them (preferably for a limited time). Devs can either destroy those coins or issue another round of sale, whichever they prefer. Everyone is happy, confidence in project rises. Of course some trolls are trying to make a chaos here. And devs for unknown reason are not communicating with the community instead of simply implement the above solution, which is the only fair and natural solution here. Let's hope they will fix this ASAP and we can move on to actual development of the project.

Author: BlockHedge
Title: COINDASH - Future of trading - Token Sale 17th July 2017
Body: These Whitelist guys are relentless.  I doubt they will get ETH back though.  If CoinDash offered ETH - everybody would request it.  Why?  Because we all know the price of CDT is going to crater as soon as the coins are released and they hit exchanges.  So if a Whitelister really still believes in the team and project (for whatever reason), the smart thing to do is get your ETH back, wait for CDT to be listed and crash, and buy back in on exchanges for 20% (or less) of your original cost.  Then the Coindash team will have the cheapest ICO token, post ICO, in history, AND they will have no money because they refunded all the whitelist ETH.  I'm guessing the CoinDash team doesn't want to kill their project, so I doubt the whitelisters are getting their ETH back.  Sorry guys.

Author: C The Saint
Title: COINDASH - Future of trading - Token Sale 17th July 2017
Body: Ridiculous statement us on the whitelist do not want your CDT tokens we have been sold a project on false pretences and you have the opportunity to make that right by refunding the eth in exchange for our CDT tokens and burning them. If you really want to gain consumer confidence you will offer people this option you have our Eth not the hacker. Bancor offered the same opportunity when they were DDOS'd during the ICO.  You have also have not addressed this issue.  Quote As sad as the theft was, the other investors get diluted against the agreed upon terms by doing this. Apart from the obvious fact that the team's credibility just received a massive hit after ignoring all the well-intended advice regarding token sale best practices meaning the token will most likely lose a good chunk of its value right from the start, this compensation scheme is also wide open to game theoretic attacks. If the above promise holds true, the attacker can simply send ETH to the fake address from another sufficiently uncorrelated and seemingly innocent address they own and mint "free" CDT, effectively emptying the pockets of the investor's base via downwards inflationary pressure on the price. This has zero cost on them. They just get more CDT, the more ETH they send to themselves. Also, there is no way to disprove this was an inside job which means that you can't restrict the "compensation" to contributions made before the announcement because the insider(s) could have taken that into account.

Title: COINDASH - Future of trading - Token Sale 17th July 2017
Body: Guys we hope to receive deep understanding today about the way the hacker succeeded to bypass our site security, as soon as we will get those final answers we will deliver them to you. Author: TKeenan
Title: COINDASH - Future of trading - Token Sale 17th July 2017
Body: Yeah it'd be nice if the same 3-4 people stopped spamming about the whitelist refund already. We get it, you want a whitelist refund. Objectively speaking it probably isn't going to happen but you've made your opinion known.  Although, I suppose it could be possible (a whitelist refund) if they planned on doing another ICO (well I guess it wouldn't be "Initial" anymore), only properly this time. They'd obviously receive MUCH less money but at least it'd be willing investors and the project wouldn't go under from lack of funds.  The problem stems from how much they need for their roadmap over the next year and if they can figure out HOW they were actually hacked. If they can't figure it out then we've made no progress. I have a feeling that's why they've been silent for most of today. They're trying to figure out how they were hacked and if they can track the hacker down with assistance from law enforcement (there are surely logs on the web server and what not). If they have a way to recover the funds then that's priority #1 and I could see why they'd be absent most of today.  On the other hand, they could just be fighting among themselves, blaming each other for the destruction of the project. There were a lot of legit partners involved in this that I'm sure don't appreciate the CoinDash team letting this happen.

Waiting for the contract address on their webpage and then send the ether to that address. I fell for it, too. Of course, you can blame me on bad diligence, but then again the only strange thing I noticed was that ugly font/design when the contract address got released. And yet I am really not into these wild conspiracy theories claiming that it all was a planned scam by the developers. So when you didnt believe that this is a scam in the first place, what, except for the design of the announcement, should have made you suspicious? Dont get me wrong, I feel responsible for the mistake I made and I am pretty sure that if there wasn't that FOMO beginner mistake, I would still have my funds. Nevertheless I think everybody should be treated equally here if the company is serious. Simply because for the fact that people got told "do this, and you will get tokens from us". I did that. And I got no tokens lol, I even opened a MEW address because they advised me to do so, while MetaMask would have done good too I assume. Talk about diligence Of course, if CoinDash was a scam from begin on, all what I said is extraneous. The logic I am trying to impart here only applies when the CoinDash team is serious. My 2 satoshis. And another 2 here: https://steemit.com/coindash/@hawtoken/how-i-experienced-the-coindash-hack including a small chronicle of the events

Author: Au-OG
Title: COINDASH - Future of trading - Token Sale 17th July 2017
Body: They already issued one round of useless CR! tokens back in the ether.camp hackathon.  So hack aside what was the logic behind early investors sending more ETH to participate in the ICO?  I mean I was an early backer and bought CR! tokens under the impression they were worth something...    From gitte[Suspicious link removed]/CoinDash-io/Lobby  Alon Muroch @negedzuregal Dec 14 2016 19:39 Last day to get your CoinDash tokens at 0.01 HKG before the price goes up!  bamos01 @bamos01 Dec 14 2016 22:49 What is the reason to buy CR tokens?  Alon Muroch @negedzuregal Dec 15 2016 00:41 Hi @bamos01, great to have you here! Our product is 100% directed to crypto investors, developed by crypto investors. The most critical stages in a startup's life is its early days until it reaches market fit, that is, a product optimised enough to give great value to its users. The same way traditional investors invest in a company and get direct influence of its decision making (a sit in the board of directors), any of our investors will do as well. The tokens can be used by us only if we convince you, our investors, they will be used at the right development direction. As we optimise our product, the token's value will rise as it will become more attractive and the company's product becomes better and better. Buy more tokens early on, you will have more influence on decision making and future development. An incredible side effect is that the more people invest in us the more market validation we get which means, again, the company becomes even more attractive.    On top of that they strung us along asking to contact them as they had a reward for early investors  From their blog posts...  "Ether.Camp early investors call â To further emphasis our appreciation of your support, we want to grant a special reward to those of you who backed us from day one. We are calling all of you who supported us through the Ether.Camp Hackathon to contact us and get your reward. Please send your e-mail and name used during the Hackathon to contact@coindash.io. We will reach you as soon as possible."  Turns out this "reward" was just the opportunity to send them more ETH via the whitelist. LOL  Did any of you other early investors have a similar view and expectations as myself? Or did I see this all wrong?  EDIT: for full disclosure I declined the "opportunity" to participate in the ICO

Title: COINDASH - Future of trading - Token Sale 17th July 2017
Body: To be fair to those who sent to the fake address.  It was published on the official site and they didn't want to miss out on the ICO since many have sold out in minutes.    A solution that might still save this project is to offer 2 options for investors.   1.  Offer refunds for those on the whitelist first and if there are remaining ETHs left, offer those who sent to the fake address. 2.  Increase the amount of CDT for all those who want to keep their investments.  Use the tokens that were refunded and give those who still      want to support the project an additional bonus.  The team may end up with zero ETHs from this and more CDTs, but if they truly believe in their own project and work hard for it's success, those additional CDT's will pay off.  Look at projects like Stratis for example.  Turned pennies into dollars.

Author: TKeenan
Title: COINDASH - Future of trading - Token Sale 17th July 2017
Body: Whitelisters will not receive a refund. I'm not sure why that's being mentioned. They paid for a token and they're going to get it. This hack does not affect them. CoinDash is even going as far as giving those who were scammed their tokens since it was their fault for having lax security on their website.  The only issue is that now the tokens will be devalued due to lack of faith in the project/developer, but to be fair there was never a promise of value in the tokens/ICO. You're buying on speculation that they'll be worth something and because you want to fund the project. If they turn out to be worthless, then you lost on that speculation.  If devaluing a token is the main issue to some then Bancor was also wrong to keep selling over their promised limit (increasing their market cap and ruining good-faith with participants in the ICO). If anything this hack would normally increase the value of CDT because the market cap will be around 6m rather than the originally planned 12m (meaning more room for profit for investors).  Once again the real issue is CoinDash earning our trust again somehow. If people have no faith in the project/devs then the tokens will become worthless. This is coming from someone who is $30,000 deep in this mess. I obviously want CoinDash to recover so I don't end up losing my investment. They have a LONG way to go to earn our respect/trust again though, especially considering the market is currently recovering today (most things are up 20% or more) and we're stuck sitting here wondering how much we're going to lose rather than gain...

Author: blueangel01
Title: COINDASH - Future of trading - Token Sale 17th July 2017
Body: Yes fill it up. They cannot hack you just by telling them your address and transaction Hash. All the information required can be found in the etherscan without opening your wallet. if you know your address. People should get a ENS so they can check their wallet constantly without opening or memorizing their address. You can search my address https://etherscan.io/enslookup?q=gildarsh.eth for example.   It is unfortunate but this hacking happened because of their "White list" that sounds like racist. It puts other people who does not belong in the whitelist to be like a 2nd rate citizen. Other ICO in the past are able to provide the ETH address 2 days before the ICO. People are able to verify the contract of the ICO publicly before the ICO started. But since there is a Whitelist, they could not publish the address just to give unfair advantage to their "Early Supporters." Therefore, it created an opportunity to the hacker to hacked the website just after the timer started.  As an investor who missed out on the other iCO because it finishes so quickly, we did not bother checking the address. We just add the address and send it immediately without even checking the address if it is a contract or not. https://drive.google.com/open?id=0B7288nKEgxRJRTJfX0p2VTQtVTg In the image you can compare the 2 addres - 1 is from the contract in IMMLA (other ICO) and the other is the fake coindash address (not a contract).  I already accepted that i messed up because i did not check the address. But i am happy with the response of the Coindash team to still give our my CDT (Hopefully). Next time I will check the address before sending them, safety 1st ofcourse. Also, I hope in the future ICOs, people should go against the whitelist and request transparency of the ETH address so we can review it.

Author: C The Saint
Title: COINDASH - Future of trading - Token Sale 17th July 2017
Body: Can you explain why you will not be refunding people who sent to the whitelisted address? You could easily create a smart contract where people sent their CDT and go their ETH in return.  Can you also explain how you will deal with his issue?  Quote As sad as the theft was, the other investors get diluted against the agreed upon terms by doing this. Apart from the obvious fact that the team's credibility just received a massive hit after ignoring all the well-intended advice regarding token sale best practices meaning the token will most likely lose a good chunk of its value right from the start, this compensation scheme is also wide open to game theoretic attacks. If the above promise holds true, the attacker can simply send ETH to the fake address from another sufficiently uncorrelated and seemingly innocent address they own and mint "free" CDT, effectively emptying the pockets of the investor's base via downwards inflationary pressure on the price. This has zero cost on them. They just get more CDT, the more ETH they send to themselves. Also, there is no way to disprove this was an inside job which means that you can't restrict the "compensation" to contributions made before the announcement because the insider(s) could have taken that into account.

Author: Ukraine2020
Title: COINDASH - Future of trading - Token Sale 17th July 2017
Body: Dear CoinDash contributors,  It is unfortunate for us to announce that we have suffered a hacking attack during our Token Sale event. During the attack $7 Million were stolen by a currently unknown perpetrator. The CoinDash Token Sale secured $6.4 Million from our early contributors and whitelist participants and we are grateful for your support and contribution.  CoinDash is responsible to all of its contributors and will send CDTs reflective of each contribution. Contributors that sent ETH to the fraudulent Ethereum address, which was maliciously placed on our website, and sent ETH to the CoinDash.io official address will receive their CDT tokens accordingly. Transactions sent to any fraudulent address after our website was shut down will not be compensated.  This was a damaging event to both our contributors and our company but it is surely not the end of our project. We are looking into the security breach and will update you all as soon as possible about the findings.  The CoinDash vision, product and team will continue to live on. We will be fast to recover and we will create the future of trading.  Reminder: We are still under attack. Please do not send any ETH to any address, as the Token Sale has been terminated.  More information will be published on our social channels and our website.  -CoinDash Team   https://www.coindash.io/  I think everything will be all right.... Let's wait ..

Author: BlockHedge
Title: COINDASH - Future of trading - Token Sale 17th July 2017
Body: Several exchanges have been hacked and have had funds stolen and they are still fully operational, as they made their clients whole.  If CoinDash creates a unique and solid project, and hires some decent security people to fix their issues - why should they be any different?  It is easy in the immediate aftermath to write this entire project off as a complete failure and dead - and many will sell their tokens at a large loss.  But maybe we shouldn't just all sell out immediately.  I judge a team on their performance after true adversity strikes and how they move forward and overcome.  Unfortunately the CoinDash team has a monstrous mountain in front of them now.  How they react from here will reveal their true colors.  They need to be 1) as transparent as possible, 2) show how they were hacked and what they will do to fix the security issues, 3) work twice as hard to overcome the obvious reputation problem they are going to have with half the funds they were hoping for, 4) be as patient as saints with all the venom that is about to come there way.

Title: COINDASH - Future of trading - Token Sale 17th July 2017
Body: If this is a scam, it's quite smart. 1) Set up a website with a capped ico (not uncapped so it doesn't look too scammy) 2) change addr in the middle of the ICO 3) pretend to be hacked 4) promise to give the scammed people tokens as a "solution" 5) actually you offload the loss to the people who invested to the right address, by making them pay an "invisible tax" to refund the scammed ones 6) go back to normal, you now have $7 million in your pocket and less angry people because they were "refunded" with tokens I am not saying it's a scam... but if it is, it's a pretty good one .

Author: EvelinkaEvi
Title: COINDASH - Future of trading - Token Sale 17th July 2017
Body: Here is official announcement from official website CoinDash "Dear CoinDash contributors,  It is unfortunate for us to announce that we have suffered a hacking attack during our Token Sale event. During the attack $7 Million were stolen by a currently unknown perpetrator. The CoinDash Token Sale secured $6.4 Million from our early contributors and whitelist participants and we are grateful for your support and contribution.  CoinDash is responsible to all of its contributors and will send CDTs reflective of each contribution. Contributors that sent ETH to the fraudulent Ethereum address, which was maliciously placed on our website, and sent ETH to the CoinDash.io official address will receive their CDT tokens accordingly. Transactions sent to any fraudulent address after our website was shut down will not be compensated.  This was a damaging event to both our contributors and our company but it is surely not the end of our project. We are looking into the security breach and will update you all as soon as possible about the findings.  The CoinDash vision, product and team will continue to live on. We will be fast to recover and we will create the future of trading.  Reminder: We are still under attack. Please do not send any ETH to any address, as the Token Sale has been terminated.  More information will be published on our social channels and our website.  -CoinDash Team"

Author: Hyakku
Title: COINDASH - Future of trading - Token Sale 17th July 2017
Body: As someone caught up in this, that makes no sense. Rolling back the entire blockchain for 7M because all of us were too complacent to do full due diligence is nonsense. While the team here should have done better and I'm not blaming everyone else as the primary cause, it's not like this was a contract flaw or something. We just sent money to an address immediately out of FOMO, and as much as it sucks that's just what happens when you take a risk and don't thoroughly vet something.  Edit: This also doesn't make sense as an inside job if they refund the tokens. If that was the plan it would be smarter to let the ico close, dump their own Cdt and take all of the ETH. If youre going to steal 7m you might as well steal more, I can't imagine your moral compass stops at 7m worth of theft.

Author: Praxis
Title: COINDASH - Future of trading - Token Sale 17th July 2017
Body: I hope you all learned a valuable lesson from this... instead of investing in these ICO promising vapor revolutions/disruptions, with mottos like "future of trading", and meaningless buzzwords like "operating system of cryptocurrencies", you should look at real crypto-currencies that are based on Proof-of-Work, crypto-currencies that are really doing something interesting that Bitcoin is not doing yet: Litecoin's Lightning Network integration, Monero's anonymity, Decred's governance (on-chain coin voting)... Such things. I cannot for the life of me understand why you find these Ponzis ICOs more interesting than those projects... And in the end, you get scammed, too.  You cannot get scammed with a Proof-of-Work coin.

Body: This is an interesting situation for the Ethereum dev team in my view.  I believe they will have to roll back the Ethereum blockhain. A good lawyer should be able to force the Eth team to rollback again as they did it previously without specifying criteria for rollback qualification. If the hack really happened, this is the only way to get the peoples money back.  if the Eth team did not want to be in this position, the should not have allowed the DAO rollback. it is a matter of principle.

Author: Hyakku
Title: COINDASH - Future of trading - Token Sale 17th July 2017
Body: I'm still skeptical but if this is true, no need to really be a dick here. If it's not a scam they're probably working overtime to try to assuage fears and a typo on bitcoin talk is an absurd thing to get pissed about. Again though, this only stands so long as they keep their word.  While the hack will definitely cast a shadow over the ico and lower the initial price short term, I also think that if they handle this appropriately in the next few hours and reallly deliver, the long term value will remain. I won't lie and say I wasn't planning on potentially selling ico coins when they hit the exchange, but I also liked this project enough such that I plan to buy back in once the initial exchange dump happens to hold long term if they can fix this mess.

Author: Hyakku
Title: COINDASH - Future of trading - Token Sale 17th July 2017
Body: Burning tokens would help, but don't get me wrong, I agree with everyone else that the value is definitely going to be impacted short term. However, the reality is that most of these ICOs, including the responsible ones, are raising multiples of what any comparatively sized startup in Silicon Valley raises at their stage of growth. There's no way a team this small at this stage should have a burn rate of 1M+ a month, so rationally speaking the next six months to a year are pretty much going to go as though the hack never happened.  That said, it's not like crypto markets behave rationally, so I don't expect that to be the general outlook. On top of that, it's not even crazy not to trust a trading platform that can't secure their own shit, so I'm not entirely hopeful that this project survives this, just pointing out that there is a way where they still can succeed, but it's going to be a Herculean task to pull off and I'm not sure they're up for it.

Author: Hyakku
Title: COINDASH - Future of trading - Token Sale 17th July 2017
Body: The only thing that really makes sense short of refunding the ETH is to issue the appropriate amount of CDT to people who sent to the wrong address and simultaneously reduce the amount raised by that much (~$7M) while burning any excess over what was planned. Otherwise, unless the dev team is part of the scam, there's no way they'll be able to launch a project and/or raise funds on the new address and they're basically DOA.

Body: Guys, This is really not that difficult to understand. Actually we are all surprise by your questions about the bonus. A quick explanation...  We are offering a fix amount of CDTs, We have a cap of only 80K ETH, If those 80K will be sold during the first day that everybody gets the bonus If everybody receives the bonus there is no difference between the investors, the bonus comes into effect between the different stages, so if the sale will take further than 1 day, those buyers will get less CDTs.  This is being done in EVERY token sale with bonuses, Check it! the cap is 80K ETH we can't and won't accept more. We took yesterday average ETH price to set the Cap, when the price was actually lower than 150$, Things could have easily been the other way around.

Author: TKeenan
Title: COINDASH - Future of trading - Token Sale 17th July 2017
Body: Alright so I've discovered conflicting information on how to participate in the ICO. Can someone from CoinDash clarify?  In a blog post it's clearly stated that the "Recommended Gas for the Token sale is 200,000 and the maximum Gas Price is 50 Gwei."  https://www.coindash.io/how-to-securely-participate-in-the-coindash-token-sale-and-public-beta-access/  Yet in the PDF for the MyEtherWallet instructions, it says "There is a slide bar for choosing the gas amount, please set it to 'Fast AF' (60 Gwei)"  https://coindash.io/wp-content/uploads/TokenSale-MyEtherWallet.pdf  So is there a Gas Limit of 50 Gwei or not? If there is, anyone following the PDF will to fail (as their transaction will be rejected). If there isn't, anyone following the blog will fail (as their transaction will be slower than the rest).

Author: vinipoars
Title: COINDASH - Future of trading - Token Sale 17th July 2017
Body: Guys, I don't know if it was already discussed, but I think there's an error in the White Paper:  Page 9: "The graph below visually represents the various user groups as discussed: above, showing the huge potential to which crypto investments can expand.  [IMAGE] Hard Core -  users who have their life savings and salary in crypto, invest in many types of investment instruments. Amateurs -  users who have a substantial amount of their savings in crypto.  Potential -  users who, with the right accessibility to investment tools, will invest in crypto assets. Non -  users who have a substantial amount of their savings in crypto.   Non has the same definition as Amateurs.

Author: M++
Title: COINDASH - Future of trading - Token Sale 17th July 2017
Body: I do it all day long on Slack...  REMINDER: You can be targeted by scams!  We will ask you to be careful and to report us anything strange. There is no pre-sale! We will not ask you by private message to participate to the token sale, there is absolutely no funding address before 17th July! Be careful scammers are usually using almost the same nickname, and the same profile picture. They can make fake website, fake social media accounts... The official website is CoinDash.io, always check the domain name to be sure.  Coindash.tech / Coindash.xyz / Coindash.ch ARE FAKE WEBSITES!  Lately they use Slackbot to send messages to all the members, unfortunately it's impossible to stop, we will never contact you with slackbot, or by private message.

Author: CoinDash HQ
Title: COINDASH - Future of trading - Token Sale 17th July 2017
Body: CoinDashers  We are taking precautions to prevent any Twitter issues. We assembled a google form for those of you still having Twitter difficulties. We have tried several different approaches in order to receive the data from the Twitter API but faced many restrictions due to the large amount of participants. most of you have the correct count, some unfortunately still suffering wrong results.  If you are one of the unlucky few, please fill out this form : https://goo.gl/forms/SdedTcpCn4EYaAfC2  Don't worry all information will be kept only to our needs and will not be published.  Last, we are working very hard on many angels at the moment. Those of you who will submit the form will be counted manually, please make sure you did everything right as asked to before submitting the form so we will not have to postpone the entire bounty distribution.  Thanks!

Author: M++
Title: COINDASH - Future of trading - Token Sale 17th July 2017
Body: One week left!    First of all the team want to thanks you for your support guys! We are 3000+ on Slack, 4500+ on Twitter, 430+ on Telegram, 2500+ on Wechat! We are very happy with that kind of numbers, it means a lot to us!  I want to do a Recap like that everything is clear, the Token Sale will take place on Monday, July 17th 13:00pm GMT, we suggest you to be on Slack at this time, and to trust only two sources: #Announcements on Slack (no private message, no slack bot... Please!), and our Website: CoinDash.io!  The only way to buy CDT will be to send ETH to our smart contract address which will be revealed on the website!   Here is our Last Newsletter make sure to read our last development, with a new advisor on board, meetups in Kiev and Beijing, Bonus structure, Price of each CDT in USD... And more!   https://www.coindash.io/one-week-left  Official Website: https://www.coindash.io Token Sale Page: https://www.coindash.io/token-sale White Paper: https://www.coindash.io/wp-content/uploads/2017/06/Coindash-v0.5.pdf  Twitter: https://www.twitter.com/coindashio Slack: https://www.coindash.io/slack

Author: mankeen
Title: COINDASH - Future of trading - Token Sale 17th July 2017
Body: CoinDash weekly update - July 9th   Hello CoinDashers!  Only a week to go until our Token Sale opening shot, as we approach it, more important information will be released. This weekly update includes most of the recent development so letâs get to it!     Early birds Bonus rates revealed - As done almost in all Token Sales, we at CoinDash would also like to reward our early contributors. Those who wish to join and participate our Token Sale immediately after it starts and for the duration of the first day will receive a bonus on their contribution. The idea behind the bonus is to incentivise and reward those who make the first move and show their support for CoinDash by taking part in the Token Sale on its initiation. And so, the bonus rates that will be given during or Token Sale:    First day bonus - 30%  First week bonus - 20%  Second week bonus - 10%  Rest of the Token Sale period bonus - 0%    CDT sale price - As of now, only 1 piece is missing and that is the CDT/ETH price. Since we are offering 500,000,000 CDT Tokens in return for a Maximum of $12,000,000 in ETH equivalent, assuming the Token sale will reach the designated cap, each CDT will be valued at $0.032 however with the 30% bonus on first day contributions, the effective token price will be only 0.024$. Due to the fact the sale is conducted using ETH only, the CDT/ETH price is yet to be known. In order to mitigate ETH price volatility risk we will set the ETH price 2 days before the Token Sale according to CoinMarketCap ETH price average. official ETH price announcement will be delivered accordingly 2 days before the sale.

Author: nelson4lov
Title: COINDASH - Future of trading - Token Sale 17th July 2017
Body: If you accessed your ETH wallet through the link, Then You're in a deep poo. You don't necessarily need to use your private key. Even using Your Keystore file or mnemonic phrase means You're probably going to get your account hacked and funds stolen. The best thing to do is never click links on the internet you know nothing about. If there was an issue on Ethereum network like majority of the Slackbot messages say, We would know about it already. I don't need a bot to dictate what I do. Same goes for everyone else.

Author: CoinDash HQ
Title: COINDASH - Future of trading - Token Sale 17th July 2017
Body: CoinDashers!  Those of you in our Slack and everywhere else...pay attention   Now that our Token sale details are out there, we need to be constantly aware of scammers and phishing attempts being made. Several projects have been recently hurt by such attempts and we want you guys to be extra careful and suspicious during this time. Few days before the Token sale we will close and moderate our Slack channels to avoid such attempts. Until than we ask you to ignore every message received from unknown CoinDash team members and reported to us immediately once such attempt occurs CoinDash authorised team members are : @coindash, @adamefrima , @mplus, @elis, @jonathan.f, @jodyhsu & @ram Help us be safe and protect our community!

(AP, 7/17/08) 2007        Jul 17, The Dow Jones industrial average crossed 14,000 for the first time before ending the day at 13,918.22.     (AP, 7/17/08) 2007        Jul 17, The California State Water Resources Control board passed a 70-year mercury cleanup plan for the SF Bay.     (SFC, 7/19/07, p.B1) 2007        Jul 17, In Virginia Michael Vick, quarterback of the Atlanta Falcons, was indicted by a federal grand jury along with 3 others on charges related to competitive dog fighting. In Dec. Vick was sentenced to 23 months in prison for his role in a dogfighting conspiracy that involved gambling and killing pit bulls.     (SFC, 7/19/07, p.A6)(AP, 12/10/07) 2007        Jul 17, Whole Foods launched an internal investigation after it became public that CEO John Mackey had for many years posted critical comments online against Wild Oats prior to a planned acquisition of the firm this year.     (Econ, 7/21/07, p.62) 2007        Jul 17, In Sao Paulo, Brazil, a TAM airlines Airbus-320 slammed into a gas station and a TAM building and burst into flames after trying to land on a short, rain-slicked runway at Congonhas airport. All 187 people aboard were killed along with 12 on the ground.     (AP, 7/18/07)(AP, 7/17/08) 2007        Jul 17, A British court sentenced Yassin Nassari (27), a British-born Syrian cleric, to 3Â½ years in prison for bringing missile plans into Britain in 2006. He had led a branch of the Islamic Society at the Univ. of Westminster. Nassari served just over seven months of his sentence.     (Econ, 1/9/10, p.61)(www.guardian.co.uk/uk/2008/mar/28/terror.release) 2007        Jul 17, Cambodia's government issued a directive preventing Christians from promoting their religion in public places, or using money or other means to persuade people to convert.     (AP, 7/17/07) 2007        Jul 17, A foreman from a kiln in north China where workers were beaten and forced to work 18-hour days was sentenced to life in jail and another man was sentenced to death for the beating death of a laborer. A total of 29 people were convicted in seven different courts in Shanxi for their roles in the slavery scandal.     (AP, 7/17/07) 2007        Jul 17, An international think-tank said China's smog-choked cities and contaminated waterways are leaving many people sick and unable to work, in turn fomenting unrest and threatening the country's economic growth.     (AP, 7/17/07) 2007        Jul 17, It was reported that the UN's Food and Agriculture Organization and WFP estimated that the cereal deficit for East Timor this year and next will reach 86,364 tons. With commercial imports anticipated at 71,000 tons, the shortfall needs to be filled through food assistance.     (AFP, 7/17/07) 2007        Jul 17, Lawmakers loyal to anti-US cleric Muqtada al-Sadr said they are ending a nearly five-week boycott of parliament sessions after officials accepted their demands for rebuilding a Shiite shrine damaged by bombings. In eastern Baghdad a suicide driver detonated his vehicle near an Iraqi army patrol in Zayouna, a mostly Shiite area, killing 10 people including six civilians. The bodies of two security guards were found in the western Baghdad neighborhood of Mansour, two days after they were kidnapped from the office of a cell phone company where they worked. 29 members of a Shiite tribe were massacred overnight in Diyala province when dozens of suspected Sunni gunmen raided their village near Muqdadiyah. The dead included four women. 3 American soldiers were killed in separate bombings in Baghdad.     (AP, 7/17/07)(AP, 7/18/07) 2007        Jul 17, In Lebanon militants continued to resist the army's advance. Security officials said Army troops are making "significant" gains in their long-running battle against al-Qaida-inspired fighters barricaded inside a Palestinian refugee camp in northern Lebanon. At least 60 militants and more than 20 civilians have been killed in fighting since May 20.     (AP, 7/17/07) 2007        Jul 17, Libya's foreign minister said the death sentences for five Bulgarian nurses and a Palestinian doctor accused of infecting hundreds of Libyan children with HIV have been commuted to life in prison. The ruling came after the families of the children each received $1 million and agreed to drop their demand for the execution of the six.     (AP, 7/17/07) 2007        Jul 17, Najib Razak, Malaysiaâs deputy prime minister, said Malaysia is an Islamic state and not a secular one, while carefully assuring members of minority faiths that their rights will be protected. But while the constitution defines the ethnic majority Malays as Muslims it also guarantees freedom of religion. (SFC, 7/22/14, p.A4) 2014        Jul 17, Microsoft said it will cut 18,000 jobs over the next year, 14% of its total work force, in an effort to make the company more nimble.     (SFC, 7/18/14, p.C1) 2014        Jul 17, Elaine Stritch (b.1925), actress and singer, died at her home in Birmingham, Mi. Her films included âA Farewell to Arms" (1957), âSeptember" (1987), âOut to Sea" (1997) and âSmall Time Crooks" (2000).     (SFC, 7/18/14, p.A7) 2014        Jul 17, In Afghanistan four militants armed with rocket-propelled grenades attacked Kabul International Airport. All 4 were killed by police special forces.     (AP, 7/17/14) 2014        Jul 17, Australia's government repealed a much-maligned carbon tax on the nation's worst greenhouse gas polluters, ending years of contention over a measure that became political poison for the lawmakers who imposed it.     (AP, 7/17/14) 2014        Jul 17, In Brazil China's President Xi Jinpin pressed a charm offensive with Latin America, signing deals with Brazil, meeting regional leaders and proposing a $20 billion infrastructure fund that highlights Beijing's growing interests in the region.     (AP, 7/18/14) 2014        Jul 17, Airbus said that its orders and commitments for 496 aircraft at Englandâs Farnborough International Airshow. Boeing, meanwhile, secured business for 201 airplanes.     (AP, 7/17/14) 2014        Jul 17, Cambodian police arrested two more opposition members of parliament on charges of leading an insurrection.     (Reuters, 7/17/14) 2014        Jul 17, The Royal Canadian Mounted Police laid 31 charges against suspended Sen. Mike Duffy over some $200,000 of falsified expenses.     (SFC, 7/18/14, p.A2) 2014        Jul 17, Chinaâs Ministry of Civil Affairs said heavy rains and landslides over the past week have killed at least 45 people in southern China and left 21 others missing.     (AP, 7/17/14) 2014        Jul 17, A European court ordered Russia to pay damages for putting defendants in metal cages in court, a practice it condemned as "degrading treatment." The enclosures have held opposition figures, Greenpeace activists and untold numbers of less-prominent suspects across the country.     (AP, 7/17/14) 2014        Jul 17, French President Francois Hollande began a visit to Ivory Coast to boost economic ties with a nation emerging from a long conflict that divided it and set back production. Ivory Coast still hosts hundreds of French companies.     (AFP, 7/17/14) 2014        Jul 17, France's parliament adopted a law calling for more use of probation and other measures to reduce overcrowding in a creaking prison system.     (Reuters, 7/17/14) 2014        Jul 17, In Iraq a bomb attack ripped through a sprawling Baghdad market, killing 5 people. An 18-year-old Australian man was later identified as the suicide bomber. In Taji a suicide bomber rammed his car into a military checkpoint, killing 7 people. Militants attacked the Turkuman town of Amirli overnight, striking from three directions. 9 insurgents and one soldier were killed in the fighting.     (AP, 7/18/14)(AFP, 7/21/14) 2014        Jul 17, Iraq's autonomous region of Kurdistan pumped an experimental 20,000 barrels of light crude from an oilfield recently seized from the federal authorities. It was the first time the Kurds pumped oil from Bai Hassan field -- 55 km (35 miles) northwest of Kirkuk. The field used to average 190,000 barrels per day.     (AFP, 7/17/14) 2014        Jul 17, Israeli tank fire killed three people in southern Gaza moments before a humanitarian truce began at 0700 GMT. The Israeli army said it had foiled a "major terror attack" by a group of 13 militants who managed to enter southern Israel by tunnel and were seen heading towards Sufa kibbutz near the fence. Palestinian militants fired a rocket at Israel just as a five-hour UN humanitarian cease-fire expired.     (AFP, 7/17/14)(AP, 7/17/14) 2014        Jul 17, Israel launched a ground operation late today aimed at destroying tunnels and halting rocket fire by the enclave's Hamas rulers.     (AP, 7/18/14) 2014        Jul 17, Japan said it would join forces with Britain to jointly develop missile technology for fighter jets, while also moving to export Japanese-made parts for US surface-to-air missiles.     (AFP, 7/17/14) 2014        Jul 17, Lebanon filed a complaint against Israel at the UN Security Council, saying it had violated its sovereignty by opening fire on its territory in retaliation for rocket attacks. The foreign ministry said Israel fired 102 shells at Lebanon between July 11 and 14.     (AFP, 7/17/14) 2014        Jul 17, In Libya several shells hit the terminal of the main airport in Tripoli, as fighting between rival militias for control of the airport continued for a fifth day.     (Reuters, 7/17/14) 2014        Jul 17, Libyaâs navy said it has retrieved the bodies of three would-be migrants and rescued almost 100 others after their boat sank.     (AFP, 7/17/14) 2014        Jul 17, Malaysia Airlines flight MH17 with 298 people on board was shot down over eastern Ukraine. Officials strongly suspected the Boeing 777 was downed by a missile fired by Ukrainian separatists backed by Moscow. More than half of the dead passengers, 189 people, were Dutch. Twenty-nine were Malaysian, 27 Australian, 12 Indonesian, 9 British, 4 German, 4 Belgian, 3 Filipino, one Canadian, one New Zealand and 4 as yet unidentified. All 15 crew were Malaysian. Joep Lange, pioneering AIDS researcher, was among those killed.     (Reuters, 7/18/14)(Econ, 7/26/14, p.78) 2014        Jul 17, In Myanmar more than 700 workers protested in front of the South Korean Embassy to demand officials help them after a Korean-owned factory closed without paying their wages.     (AP, 7/17/14) 2014        Jul 17, Pakistani police fought for more than 10 hours with militants they said were planning to attack the home of PM Nawaz Sharif. An intelligence officer and two militants were killed when the shootout erupted during an overnight operation in the eastern city of Lahore.     (AP, 7/17/14) 2014        Jul 17, In the Philippines three aid workers were abducted by suspected Abu Sayyaf militants in Sulu province. All three were freed after the government withheld anti-poverty funds, prompting an impoverished town to pressure the rebels to release the captives.     (AP, 7/23/14) 2014        Jul 17, Polish rescue services said 7 people have been killed after falling into a septic tank where they were overcome by toxic gas in the western village of Karczowka.     (Reuters, 7/17/14) 2014        Jul 17, Puerto Rican health officials declared an epidemic of the mosquito-borne virus known as chikungunya, which was introduced into the Caribbean region late last year.     (AP, 7/18/14) 2014        Jul 17, Russiaâs President Vladimir Putin lamented the latest round of US sanctions against Russia, saying they will stalemate bilateral relations and hurt not only Russian but also American businesses.     (AP, 7/17/14) 2014        Jul 17, In Somalia one person died and another was seriously wounded when an explosive device attached to their car was remotely detonated in Mogadishu.     (AFP, 7/17/14) 2014        Jul 17, In South Korea a firefighting helicopter crashed near an apartment complex and school in the southern city of Gwangju, killing five.     (AP, 7/17/14) 2014        Jul 17, Sri Lanka's government said Pres. Mahinda Rajapaksa has extended the terms of a commission investigating missing people and possible war crimes in the country's 26-year civil war, bringing in foreign experts for the first time to advise on the inquiry.     (Reuters, 7/17/14) 2014        Jul 17, A Swaziland lawyer said two government critics have been found guilty of contempt of court after publishing articles in which they lamented alleged threats to judicial independence.     (AP, 7/17/14) 2014        Jul 17, In central Syria Islamic militants killed as many as 270 Syrian troops, guards and workers as they captured the Shaar (Shaer) gas field in the desert region of Palmyra following daylong clashes. At least 40 militants were also reported killed. The fate of more than 200 people captured in the facility was unknown. Military helicopters dropped barrels packed with explosives on Morek. More than 20 bombs were dropped by aircraft and least 15 people, including 4 civilians, were killed in the fighting.     (AFP, 7/17/14)(AP, 7/17/14)(AP, 7/18/14)(SFC, 7/19/14, p.A2)(Reuters, 7/19/14) 2014        Jul 17, In northern Syria Jihadists in Tabaqa, Raqa province, accused a woman of adultery and stoned her to death.     (AFP, 7/18/14) 2014        Jul 17, In eastern Ukraine separatists carried out 27 attacks on army checkpoints and positions of government forces over the last 24 hours leaving 5 Ukrainian servicemen killed.     (Reuters, 7/17/14) 2014        Jul 17, Ukraine's SBU security agency released recordings of what it claimed were phone talks involving rebels and a Russian military intelligence officer admitting that they had hit a passenger jet after mistaking it for a military aircraft.     (AFP, 7/20/14)

Author: CoinDash HQ
Title: COINDASH - Future of trading - Token Sale 17th July 2017
Body: Hello CoinDashers!  The moment you were waiting for is coming momentarily announcing the Token sale date and hard cap.  But before that, some bad news. we were approached by Bitcointalk.org moderators regarding signature wearing participants who according to the moderators are spamming the forum with poor quality posts in of topic threads. After going through the list of accused users it is safe to say they are all farm accounts and their spam is clear.  We spend tremendous efforts in making this topic and maintaining the conversation level in it. We take it very seriously that although we stated endless times that spamming is not allowed, and we ask that you only post in related topic threads and forbade the use of multiple accounts, some of you absolutely ignored that.  So it was decided that all names reported to us by the forum moderators are herby disqualified immediately from our campaign. Lets us be clear about it. All bounty campaigns numbers are subject to a final check that will take place when the campaign ends. We already spotted many duplicate accounts running by the same persons and we are sure we will find many more during the final check. We reserve the right to fulfil our commitment and disqualify anyone who will be found breaching the very clear rules of the campaign.  We seriously wish this will be the last time we will have to deal with such matters as we have far more important things to focus on at the moment

Author: sj0n
Title: COINDASH - Future of trading - Token Sale 17th July 2017
Body: Coindash are are partnering with Smith and Crown amongst others (https://www.smithandcrown.com/smith-crown-plus-coindash-making-the-market-more-user-friendly/). Does anyone have an explanation then why their ICO is not mentioned anywhere on smithandcrown.com? Surely if they were serious about raising their profile this would be a no brainer?  Also not noted on ico-list, icocountdown, tokenmarket or coinschedule. Not having a set-in-stone ICO date is no excuse: there are plenty of ICOs on these site with a tentative or 'to be announced' date.  They seem to be traveling across the planet to promote their product, but are nowhere to be found in the ICO listing sites...really curious, hope someone can shed some light on this anomaly.

Author: CoinDash HQ
Title: COINDASH - Future of trading - Token Sale 17th July 2017
Body: Hey man, thanks for your points let me address them.  We are working with great relations with Smith@Crown for long time and met with them for many times now, we never realized our name is missing from their site, so thank you for that we will ask them to give us the coverage we deserve   Regarding ICO listings, we started approaching these only a week ago. As we said before we wanted the focus to be on our product and less around the ICO. We believe the validator to a great company is their product and proof of work and not just its PR efforts around the token sale. As I see it if you want to raise 100 Million USD you must put all your efforts on marketing and that is simply not the goal in our case.  Now that our beta is out we will pick up the pace in promoting our sale!

Author: CoinDash HQ
Title: COINDASH - Future of trading - Token Sale 17th July 2017
Body: CoinDashers!  Make no mistake public Beta Version will be available in days, a lot of people here have already used it and loved it and soon the rest will follow Making our Beta public before the ICO was maybe our primary goal in this entire ICO campaign as we strongly believe no project should make a token sale without showing the public its working product!! unfortunately this is not a common practice those days but we will insist on that.  A word regarding the bounty program. We launched our program 2 months ago and in the mid of the way thought we can make it fancier with automated platform, the platform came out very nice but things did not go smoothly as we wanted with the Twitter counter due to many NEW restrictions Twitter has added to their API. since than we are working to find better ways to improve the count every day! and already added new server just for that. as of today almost everyone ob the platform got their counter fixed. rest assure that by the end all of you will get their stake. On a personal level I'll say that even though things went a bit harder on that aspect I see no place for projecting this issue on the project itself as this is handled by two completely separate branches and the portfolio platform itself is running perfectly.  Last, we spend great resources on publicities and marketing of our project. The bounty program is only small part of the marketing strategy and is more about getting our community involved in the process. We want all of you who wishes to join to be rewarded for doing so but if not it is also fine.  Have a great day  Ram

Author: CoinDash HQ
Title: COINDASH - Future of trading - Token Sale 17th July 2017
Body: Hey, I'm sorry you feel like that but I don't see you asked anything about it on the Slack where we are very active and giving live updates.  Regarding your questions, If you move your money out of your portfolio how can we keep it in the platform if you are not adding the address? who will the platform will know the receiving address is also yours? of course you will have to add it (it can be done literally in 3 seconds)  Regarding secondary market transaction, this will be done only in the far future after achieving and completing the first two layers of portfolio management and social trading. And it will be done with attaching your user API to the platform and without us having your private keys.  The monetary system is not carved to stone right now, but what is sure is that in order to follow other traders a user will have to pay a fee in CDT, part of it will go to the user being followed and some to the platform.

Author: CoinDash HQ
Title: COINDASH - Future of trading - Token Sale 17th July 2017
Body: Hello CoinDashers!  Few clarifications that for some reason is not getting throw you...  1. Bounty Platform - the bounty platform is being handled and maintained by Wings.ai. After we sat and customize it for our need, we found out that due to our large number of participants making data calls to the Twitter app, we hit a restriction by Twitter allowing only few people to get their stats each day. Now, as explained OVER & OVER again, Everybody's counter will get synched with time. but, because you guys are still asking bout it every hour, we had approached Wings.ai again and they are now working on it to find ways to expedite the process.  Regarding "Pending" remarks around here - As all the campaign apart from the social ones, are being calculated by weekly stakes, We can not give you your reward at once prior the end of the campaign. for that reason, all bounties are pending until the campaign is over then they will be approved with your final stake.  2. Token Sale announcement - Again, we want to do it once and right. very soon you will get the full announcement. As there is almost a month left, there is still plenty of time before you need to stress and jump through hoops. When it will be ready, you will all get notified.  The token sale is planed to be 1 month Max. the coins will be sent back to the contributors instantly, There will be no "half year waiting" here.

Author: FandangledGizmo
Title: COINDASH - Future of trading - Token Sale 17th July 2017
Body: Nice project.  I'm sure someone would have mentioned that following top traders is a bit of a flawed strategy in crypto though?  As a simple example....  I create 10 000 accounts, 5000 short BTC and 5000 go long BTC for one week. At the end of the week 5000 will be right. With those 5000 I go short BTC with 2500 accounts for the next week and long with 2500. At the end of week 2, 2500 accounts will have got BTC direction right for 2 weeks in a row. Then with those 2500 I go short BTC with 1250 accounts and long BTC the next week with 1250...  It will only cost me trading fees but at the end of three months I will have 1 account that has got the BTC direction right every single week for 3 months in a row.  Then I reveal myself and say hi, my name's Bob this is my trading account who wants to follow me?  People will be like 'wow he predicted the Bitcoin price correctly every week for 3 months in a row so far... '

Author: M++
Title: COINDASH - Future of trading - Token Sale 17th July 2017
Body: Hello, legit concern!  I will not answer totally about how this can be addressed but this might helps...  First of all if someone can create 10 000 accounts on our platform without trigger our attention there is a problem.    Then you said you will short 5000 btc and go long with 5000 btc, so you need 10 000 BTC to achieve your goal. I really think someone with that kind of money has better to do than trying to cheat a system to later gain a relatively small reward compare to the amount needed. Because to do that you will have to pay a huge amount of fees. If you long and short that much BTC you will lose a lot of Bitcoin whatever is it going down or up...  Of course, I know this what a metaphor!  This is a legit question because it can be done with much lower numbers, maybe even 10 accounts and 10 BTC... You can achieve a really high performance on one account. So yes it's possible, but what will be important for any users who want to follow you, is consistency, volume and the history of your account.  Automatically if you have to make 10 accounts and divide your 10 bitcoin, you will get way smaller volume than any other good traders on the platform. I would rather follow someone with skin in the game with real volume.   I can add this: When you want to use your "winning account" to trick users on CoinDash, you will have no choice to perform incredibly well to stay at the top.  I really think some people will really try to trick the system   Even CoinDash Team will make some test, but I really don't think long term it will be a real problem, for the reasons evoqued and because the reward seems to be small compare to the effort needed...  There is MANY other way to really prevent that, we will of course take all the necessary measures on the go to prevent this type of problems.

Author: CoinDash HQ
Title: COINDASH - Future of trading - Token Sale 17th July 2017
Body: It's finally here !!  Presenting you CoinDash's Bounty Platform https://bounty.coindash.io  How to use our bounty platform - Must read rules and notices! 1. Everyone must open an account in order to get the bounty 2. On registration, use the same mail you used for your Slack! Otherwise,  your stakes will be approved 2. Even if you are already in the spreadsheets, you must apply to all of the bounties your are participating in 3. All non related social platforms bounties are under the "+" button - Custom bounties 4. Twitter counter - the twitter counter takes up to an hour to sync 5. Facebook counter - this counter is operating externally 6. Signature campaign - Put your user profile link under "Link" 7. All custom bounties (Signatures,blog,ambassadors and Misc) will be pending until the end of the campaign than replace by final numbers 8. STARS are intermediately tokens, to allocated CDT will be distributed according to your stars holdings  This week we will open our new bounty thread, please be patient, soon all bounty talks here will be over    Have fun and enjoy our platform

Author: lyka
Title: COINDASH - Future of trading - Token Sale 17th July 2017
Body: "CoinDashâs automated Bounty Platform - Tomorrow you will be able to register to our brand new automated bounty system. After we will provide you with the link, simply create a new user, enter your bounty ETH address to which you wish to receive your rewards and apply to all the campaigns your are currently participating in and many others. Pay attention: All users, both existing and new, are requested to create an account on the platform and apply to all of the campaigns they are participating in. After you finish applying to the campaigns, our team will go through your requests and approve them. Please note that in return for your participation you will be entitled to STARS which in turn will be converted into CDTs after the Token sale is over."

Author: Yza_azY
Title: COINDASH - Future of trading - Token Sale 17th July 2017
Body: U have do this?  Quote from: CoinDash HQ on April 30, 2017, 01:28:41 PM CoinDash's Social Bounty Campaign  During our social bounty campaign we are offering our participants a total allocation of 1% from our overall token supply (AKA CoinDash's Bounty pool). At the moment the CoinDashâs token - CDT,  total supply is expected to be 1,000,000,000 making the bounty share at 10 Million CDT. As the projects moves along towards the ICO the total number of tokens in circulation may vary but in any case 1% will still be designated to the bounty campaign. The duration of the campaign will be from its starting day expected to be on July 2017, until the end of its ICO weather by its finishing date or by reaching its full cap.  The total bounty designated tokens will be allocated once more into several campaign pools as will be presented here. The participants in each campaign will share the total allocated bounty designated for their specific campaign in a pro rata manner considering the stakes each one of them had received. (Note that in some campaigns the Stakes or STARS as we call them, will be given to the participants for their weekly participation and thus participant that will join early will enjoy a bigger stake than others)  Let us be clear, as a social platform the most important thing for us is creating a strong and happy community. We believe that the bounty campaign is a great way to get our community both involved and happy. However, will not tolerate any spamming, trolling, abusing, using of bots, farm accounts or any other misconduct from any social bounty program participant and hereby reserves the right to ban and disqualify participants who will be found doing so at any stage of the campaign.  Please pay attention to the following description of each bounty as the reward criteria varies from each campaign.   Bitcointalk.org Signature campaign(20% of the Bounty pool - 2,000,000 CDT) Earn CoinDash tokens by participating in our Bitcointalk Signature campaign. Designated bounty pool of 2,000,000 Tokens will be divided among the participants proportionally to the amount of their earned stakes. Weekly stakes will be granted to each participant with regard to its forum rank and campaign registry date.  Weekly stakes to be distributed to participants according to their forum rank:  Hero/Legendary : 2.5 stakes Sr. Member: 2 Stakes Full Member : 1.5 stakes Member: 1 Stake Jr. Member: 0.5 Stake *Users wearing the official avatar will be eligible for a weakly 0.5 stake increase   Signature campaign rules:  The stakes will be counted since the moment each user submit the participation form and get approved. After their approval, participants are not allowed to change their signatures until the end of the campaign! Random check will be made and those who will be found doing so will get immediately disqualified. In order to be eligible to the bounty by the end of the campaign, one must post at least 50 posts wearing the signature by the time the campaign concludes. Pay special attention to the fact that the campaign ends exactly when the ICO concludes even if that happens before schedule in case of reaching the full cap. Each participant must make at least 1 post in CoinDash's main topic every week. All posts must be made in âAlternate cryptocurrenciesâ section of the forum! Posts in off topic threads will not get counted and spamming and trolling of all kinds will simply get the participant disqualified. Multiple accounts registration is forbidden. Checks will be made along the process and every multiple account will be delisted.  In order to take part of this campaign wear the CoinDashâs signature and Avatar suitable to your rank and fill the following form: https://goo.gl/forms/GSO7f8N7cV7zo9SF2  You can check your application's status here: https://docs.google.com/a/coindash.io/spreadsheets/d/1ZycLMHlLkN6AXx1XFaeUVKFRcY3qcWFxjevNMuOFTE4/edit?usp=sharing  Got promoted? fill this rank changing form and we will get to that: https://goo.gl/forms/VlwPq60VfpciUZre2
