[url=coindash.io]World's first crypto portfolio management platform  Avatar link: http://i.imgur.com/rKGcpRD.png?1   Topic Thread Ambassadors campaign (15% of the Bounty pool - 1,500,000 CDT)  We at CoinDash want our name and vision to be wide spread and accessible to everyone. And so, we offer you to be a part of our national team by translating our topic thread and maintaining your local CoinDash community. As perceive you as our ambassadors, we demand from you the same as we demand from ourselves meaning that in order to be eligible for the bounty you also must be active on your thread, update it according to the main thread once a week max and translate each and every announcement we make during the entire campaign! All translation must be quality translations and will be checked to avoid Copy Pasting from Google Translate. Thread translation stakes will be awarded each week from the date your translation is approved.  In order to take part in the Thread translation bounty, please send a PM to CoinDash HQ and ask to reserve your language.  Check your status here: https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1v2QUqjvcoaD3gBIKkX61SJLz09bKi1-2jQO5041f4X4/edit?usp=sharing   Blog Posts, Articles and Videos (20% of the Bounty pool - 2,000,000 CDT)  In parallel to our ongoing work with global advertising agencies, we wish to give our community the opportunity to take part in the mission and to spread the name of CoinDash to different crowds around the globe and receive appropriate reward for doing so. We are looking only for quality publications with large audience in English and possibly other languages. All publications will be measured by their quality, length, audience and creativity and will get stakes accordingly. All written material must be above 350 words while videos must be over a minimum of 5 minutes.  In order for you to participate in this campaign, send a PM CoinDash HQ with what you have in mind and wait for itâs approval. Please do not start working on you material without getting our approval first in order to avoid unpleasant situations.  Check your status here:  https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1ZibiZttA9OzqjZZDLzusX-e3aU9w0zOfNjMrQrjoinQ/edit?usp=sharing  Social networks campaign (10% of the Bounty pool â 1,000,000 CDT)  We are very active in all social platforms at CoinDash and want you to be part of our inner circle and even get rewarded for that. In order to qualify for our bounty, each of the Social networks campaign participants must be active in our Facebook page, Twitter account and our Slack channel with the following guidelines and criteria:  25 Facebook Likes/Shares â like our Facebook page at : https://www.facebook.com/coindash.io/ Than, until the end of the campaign you must Like or share at least 25 posts made by our admins on CoinDashâs official Facebook page. Notice that in order to be eligible, each Facebook participant must contain a minimum of 75 friends  25 Twitter re-tweets â Follow our Twitter at: https://twitter.com/coindashio?lang=en Than, until the end of the campaign you must re-tweet at least 25 self tweets made by our CoinDashâs official Twitter account. Notice that in order to be eligible, each Twitter participant must have a minimum of 75 followers  Slack â all you have to do is enter our Slack here: https://coindashslack.stamplayapp.com/ and join the party!  In order for you to participate in this campaign, simply Like and follow our accounts, join the Slack channel and then fill the Social networks campaign subscription form - https://goo.gl/forms/8ICrmV5mYQCPMQGX2  After submitting the subscription form you can check your application status here : https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1z36e6JHSxySd4IhK3gJJDo7vRRTENXI49gaTw--YHMM/edit?usp=sharing   Miscellaneous Bounty Pool (Up to 35% of the Bounty pool â 3,500,000 CDT)  This undesignated bounty pool will be reserved for future campaigns and for your suggestions. We have several more bounties up our sleeves and we will announce them later on as we go further into the campaign. At the mean time you can apply for different bounties you have in mind such as: listing CoinDash in ICO info pages, Site and articles translation works, leads to sponsors and advisors and whatever you think is relevant and bounty worthy!  If you have such thing in mind PM CoinDash HQ with your suggestion and we will take that from there

If your rank had changed since you first joined our signature campaign, this is the place for you to inform us. We promise to do whatever we can the make the change as soon as possible. Even if it takes time don't worry, we will get to that and you will get your stakes retroactively.  Slack invites are now working again! don't give up and resign if you didn't get it at first time  And last, have a lock at our weekly Newsletter with June overview and updates

Author: qiwoman2
Title: COINDASH - Future of trading - Token Sale 17th July 2017
Body: Coindash is right up my alley! It will be a one stop shop for coin buffs and fanatics like myself who love to join ICOS and do some trading and to have all the info I need in one place will save me so much time instead of running here and there to gather all the information I need to make well informed decisions. This is cutting edge tech that will allow Noobs like my Dad to spend a bit of time every day to grow his Crypto portfolio as well, as he just started last month and bought his first Bitcoin this week to invest! I can't wait to write about this and maybe do a video as well and share with my audiences.    Also this will be the perfect gateway to bring in all the traditional penny stockers into hardcore blockchain token investing!!!

Author: Weter29
Title: COINDASH - Future of trading - Token Sale 17th July 2017
Body: The participation rule described above, please see....  We are very active in all social platforms at CoinDash and want you to be part of our inner circle and even get rewarded for that. In order to qualify for our bounty, each of the Social networks campaign participants must be active in our Facebook page, Twitter account and our Slack channel with the following guidelines and criteria:  25 Facebook Likes/Shares â like our Facebook page at : https://www.facebook.com/coindash.io/ Than, until the end of the campaign you must Like or share at least 25 posts made by our admins on CoinDashâs official Facebook page. Notice that in order to be eligible, each Facebook participant must contain a minimum of 75 friends  25 Twitter re-tweets â Follow our Twitter at: https://twitter.com/coindashio?lang=en Than, until the end of the campaign you must re-tweet at least 25 tweets made by our admins on CoinDashâs official Twitter account. Notice that in order to be eligible, each Twitter participant must have a minimum of 75 followers  Slack â all you have to do is enter our Slack here: https://coindashslack.stamplayapp.com/ and join the party!

Author: M++
Title: COINDASH - Future of trading - Token Sale 17th July 2017
Body: One of the co-founder (Adam) is living in Shanghai for many years and he is fluent in Mandarin. We have a team in China working to promote CoinDash there.  Funny fact: CoinDash Chinese name is Coin Dashi which sounds almost the same in Chinese but actually means âCoin Masterâ.  We don't really talk a lot about what we are doing in China and Asia in general because it's not 100% revelant, but we are very active there. We have for example a Wechat group with almost 400 persons. CoinDash participated to some meetups in Shanghai and Hong-kong, and will participe to more events (Shenzhen and ChangDu...) in a near future.  If you are interested you can check one of our meetups this one was in Shanghai: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5LhApxatEQc   This is Adam talking in another event in Shanghai in April:

Author: wosch76
Title: COINDASH - Future of trading - Token Sale 17th July 2017
Body: I must admit that I didn't read the whitepaper. so I think many here could explain it better on 1broker social trading works like this. you can browse the trades and history of other people and if they are successful you can just copy their trades. Example: https://twitter.com/heezyneezy/status/867328364885024768 you click copy on the traders subpage and type in with which amount per trade you want to copy and how many trades per day. when this trader opens a new trade you will automatically open the same trade with your specified amount and profit the same way. I expect coindash to work similar but with many more options like copy ICO buys and altcoin trades. more opportunities to make profit btw. my ref-link is https://1broker.com/?r=21192

Title: COINDASH - Future of trading - Token Sale 17th July 2017
Body: It seems in the Russian branch everything is written: At the very least, you need to make 50 messages before the completion of the ICO. Be attentive as the ICO can end much earlier, ie when the maximum limit is reached. Each participant should make at least 1 message in the main (English) CoinDash thread every week. All messages must be made in the "Alternate cryptocurrencies" section! Messages in offtopic branches will not be counted, as well as spam, trolling and the like will lead to disqualification.

Author: CoinDash HQ
Title: COINDASH - Future of trading - Token Sale 17th July 2017
Body: Hello CoinDashers! We want to stop in the middle of all the rush at NYC and give you some news and updates!  Tomorrow CoinDash team is going to be in Coindesk's CONSNSUS conference were all the big names from the industry is going to be. As a team we decided we want to make the trip in order to get well informed and to present our platform and vision to the key players in crypto community. Immediately after the conference first day will end tomorrow we will be on our way to our NYC Meetup event where we are about to present CoinDash in front of 200 New Yorkers crypto enthusiasts. In order to get you well informed we are going to publish our Newsletter a bit later than usual and hopefully we will add to it all the videos from the last Meetups and events. If you still have not subscribed to our Newsletter this is a great chance to do so (Coindash.io)  As our Beta looks amazing and we are delighted with its progress, we are sure we can deliver a public beta even before the ICO starts.As a result, we decided to modify the ICO structure adding another section to it which will involve using our public Beta during the ICO. Stay tuned as this big announcement will be officially announced soon.  After receiving some requests regarding the signature pool we decided to enlarge the pool to 2,000,000 DCT allocated from the miscellaneous pool. We want you all to feel rewarded for your service and are open to even further increases in the future.  Last, as you already know, we partnered up with Wings DAO and we will be using their bounty platform during our campaign. As the customization process of the platform takes time we decided to start the Social Bounty Campaign manually and later on all participants will claim their rewards on the Bounty platform. So lets push on the social networks !! Be sure to fill out the bounty participation form on the bounty post before starting to reach to networks criteria!   That is it for now, we will keep you guys updated on the rest of the events soon, THANKS FOR YOUR AMAZING SUPPORT SO FAR!!

Author: M++
Title: COINDASH - Future of trading - Token Sale 17th July 2017
Body: Hey CoinDasher! Quick update about our meetups, more are coming, Europe tour will be announced soon, we are still working on adding events and meetups, but yesterday Co-Founders of CoinDash were in Boston!   CoinDash and Masschallange accelerator hosted a 2 hour meetup in Boston to present our company and vision to the local community.  Alon Muroch, CoinDash CEO said: "this is our first meetup in Boston but I am sure that we will visit here again. There is a lot of Blockchain talent and knowledge here Andrea we were excited to realize that many people here are very welcoming towards investment tools that will enable better transparency and control over their Crypto Assets"        CoinDash would like to extend its gratitude to Babak Kia for organizing this event  Now Co-founders of CoinDash are going to New-York, they will be present in Consensus and Token summit, but we've also setup a special meetup for CoinDash in New York https://www.meetup.com/NYC_Ethereum/events/239139067  Thanks to the NY Ethereum community to make it possible and to Stack Overflow to host this meetup! Author: pressureonme
Title: COINDASH - Future of trading - Token Sale 17th July 2017
Body: First, it's a cool Project, I liked it.  But let's make a point on the bounties. Be more specific and talk about signature bounty. Signature bounty will take %0.15 of the total crowdsale. If you sell $10,000,000 during crowdsale, signature pool will be $15,000 right?  How many participants will you get? You did not limit the number of participants. Let's say 500 participants joined the signature campaign and 400 of them became eligible for bounty at the end of the ICO. Simple math:  $15,000 / 400 = $38 per participant WHO will carry the sinature at the end of August. Only $38, oh my god. It does not even worth it.  Let's say not 400 participants, but this time 200 participants became eligible for bounty at the end of ICO. Another calculation:  $15,000 / 200 = $75 per participant WHO will carry the sinature at the end of August. The same thing here. Carrying your signature for 3 months for that much Money?  You better expand your signature bounty pool. Look at that shitty pool having %40 of the bounty pool. Some of you guys in the team are very experienced people. But how did not you make simple math before detailing the bounties? Are you serious? Pitty.

Author: CoinDash HQ
Title: COINDASH - Future of trading - Token Sale 17th July 2017
Body: Thanks for your inputs my friend, the bounty program was calculated with caution as we wanted to focus the reward on the things we thought will bring the must advantage and success in promoting CoinDash ICO campaign. I understand that you consider the signature bounty not rewarding enough and that is ok. We said more than once that the designated bounty pool of 40% will be used for further bounties we have in mind and for adding more CDTs to the bounty pools we notice are getting less appealing. for that reason exactly we keep them apart so we can control on real time and reinforce over crowded campaigns.  Anyhow, please look on the signature campaign spreadsheet, just few days after its launch and as we speak there are more than 60 participants already that see the campaign as worthwhile so I guess this is not meant to serve everybody in the crypto space.  Your remark is noted and thank you for it but we already thought about it

Author: lawsonvl
Title: COINDASH - Future of trading - Token Sale 17th July 2017
Body: It's a straight money grab, as you have correctly pointed out.  Research Getgems, their last ICO.  Only a tiny portion of ICO funds were spent on the Getgems product. Instead, the funds were paid out to themselves as a "reward", and used to launch an entirely different product, cutting out ICO investors.  Alon Muroch was lead developer at Getgems, and only quit in December.  They've tried to bury this scam, but you can still see Alon's profile pic using archive:  https://web.archive.org/web/20150701182432/http://getgems.org/

Author: CoinDash HQ
Title: COINDASH - Future of trading - Token Sale 17th July 2017
Body: Sorry that you feel that way my friend but I really don't get your point...  29% will be saved for marketing and development - user acquisition is really what makes the difference from just being another pointless ICO. The hard part of such projects these days is to engage users outside of the crypto community and it cant be done without costs. this way we can just for example grant a few tokens for new users to check our app and platform. In addition we are already discussing on locking this portion for something like a year or so until it becomes relevant.  20% for early investors , team and advisors - are you serious? it is probably less than most projects out there. I will tell you another thing. All and by all I mean all our early supporters and constantly on our necks to grant them permission to purchase more tokens via pre ICO phase. trust me when I say this these guys will not dump their CDTs as soon as those hit the market. they are for the long run. We are a big team and have a lot of advisors with more to join soon, this is really standard.  1% for bounty, I really think that allocating 100,000 USD (full cap) for bounties are more than enough to say the least.

Author: danman87
Title: COINDASH - Future of trading - Token Sale 17th July 2017
Body: Copy-ICO (Copy trade system) and automatic invest are different:  Automatic investment you will have a bunch of metrics to trigger the ICO investment. For example you want to buy in first, because you know the project is popular, then you simply set up the rule to buy-in directly. It's very convenient since you don't have to spend  the whole day (assuming you are available...) monitoring exactly when the ICO will start. If you are not sure about the ICO but would like to have a chance, you can set up rules like "If this project reaches 70% of funding" "in 24 hours" then the system will trigger the investment for you. That's the promise of never miss an ICO again.  [/quote]  We have seen lately some 30 minutes and even 5 minutes ICO that you had to be so lucky to be part of. If the ICO investment problem will be solved that would be amazing! [/quote]  This is very interesting, never saw this in an ICO before, like an FX trading dashboard lol but I believe the anxiety of knowing when will it begin is part of the gifts the ico investor is looking for

Author: Jani Valjavek
Title: COINDASH - Future of trading - Token Sale 17th July 2017
Body: How would copy- Ico  investments work?  For example, we had to create an account on Iconomi website to be able to invest. There is no way to copy such types of ICO investments. On the other hand, a few ICO have a smart contract for investing. In this case it may be feasible to copy these types of investments.  Am I right?   Will be have to pay the person we are following? Why would an experienced trader share his trades for free?  Wouldn't it create a lots of problems if there are more investments from CoinDash users than the ICO cap. For example, there's an ICO with cap of $1 million. Thousands of people are following a person which invests in this ICO. According to what I understand, it would mean a smart contract will trigger investments from all these thousand users. If it's an ideal situation, all the thousands of transactions would be processed at same moment. And ICO collection may total to $2 million when all transactions confirm simultaneously.  However, it's not ideal world so some transactions would be processed first and some later. The transactions processed later would be refunded by ICO as out crosses cap. So you'll be discriminating som between the users. Comments?   You instead of solving a problem, are increasing its effect. If many people use your services. The ICO that were lasting for 5 minutes would only last 15 seconds (one Ethereum block). Projects may get over funded because of you. Projects would have an option to refund all participants or continue with overfunded project.

Author: alonmuroch
Title: COINDASH - Future of trading - Token Sale 17th July 2017
Body: Hi Jani, thank you for the questions  How Copy ICO works - using our portfolio management platform users would be able to keep track of their portfolio and get insight about their performance as investors. Those indicators could be shared to the network. People would be able to follow those users and opt-in to copy their ICO investments. CoinDash identifies when an opt-in user makes an ICO investment and will trigger the same investments to his followers. The validation and execution of those copy ICO requests are handled by a smart contract under the control of the user.  copy ICO fee - following and copying someone is essentially a way you transfer knowledge and expertise between users, for that the following user will pay a fee which will be divided by the top trader and CoinDash.  Why should anyone share their portfolio? - its a question we've asked ourselves and had to test it with real traders. The social aspect in trading is a powerful one, many traders already share their success and positions with other to gain social statue and some even manage other peoples money for fees. They are doing it because of social incentives (get more known in the community, gain respect, have more influence) and financial incentives (people are willing to pay a lot for the right tip for a trade)  potential problems its a bit of a misconception that everyone follow only one trader or get into the same ICO at once. We are seeing the ICO and altcoin market becoming bigger and bigger all the time, with more opportunities arise every day. Enabling people to discover investment opportunities is a win for them and a win for the blockchain space because they fund blockchain projects who otherwise would find it very hard to raise capital. The alternative is that only the select few have the time and knowledge to know what to invest in... I think everyone should deserve it. keep in mind that one of the effects of copy ICO is to channel money in a smarter way by leveraging the know how of good investors.  I think that the creation and trading of crypto assets is one of the biggest use-cases for blockchain technology. a way to change the traditional financial industry. There are flaws in the crypto market, sure... there are flaws in the ICO model, sure... but the only way to make this space more competitive and produce better results is by introducing more people to it and providing them sophisticated tools to direct their capital to the right places.

Author: lawsonvl
Title: COINDASH - Future of trading - Token Sale 17th July 2017
Body: This is why Alon Muroch is called a scammer:  https://youtu.be/PBvSJzxoq7k?t=8m3s  While debuting PayKey to the world, Alon claimed that it was funded by the Getgems ICO ($800k via Koinify).  But a year later, after much pressure from the community, the opposite was revealed:  https://medium.com/@GetGems/getgems-and-beyond-d178117f520  Getgems was a scam to raise money for PayKey (an app to transfer fiat for banks, no less).  Investors' funds were paid out as rewards for "completing" development, instead of actually funding the GG project.  This allowed them to spend as little as possible on GG, and redirect most of the money into their real project, PayKey.  It also allowed them to claim that each project was separately funded, as the money first went in their pockets as compensation, not directly moving between projects.  Alon, as leader developer of Getgems, an original and multi-year partner of Danial Peled, you need to sort out the mess you're trying to escape from before asking the community for more money.  Start by telling the truth.

Author: nelson4lov
Title: COINDASH - Future of trading - Token Sale 17th July 2017
Body: I'm just curious about the CoinDash CopyICO feature. How does the smart contract know about good ICOs that will trigger it to automatically invest in? Does it use some kind of Algorithm to determine which ICOs to invest in? If Yes, I'd like to more about the Algorithm and the CopyICO feature. Thanks.  Btw, The project looks promising.

Author: M++
Title: COINDASH - Future of trading - Token Sale 17th July 2017
Body: Copy-ICO (Copy trade system) and automatic invest are different:  Automatic investment you will have a bunch of metrics to trigger the ICO investment. For example you want to buy in first, because you know the project is popular, then you simply set up the rule to buy-in directly. It's very convenient since you don't have to spend  the whole day (assuming you are available...) monitoring exactly when the ICO will start. If you are not sure about the ICO but would like to have a chance, you can set up rules like "If this project reaches 70% of funding" "in 24 hours" then the system will trigger the investment for you. That's the promise of never miss an ICO again.   On the other hand Copy trade system allows you to follow a trader and invest like him, for now the team focus on ERC20 tokens that's why we call it Copy ICO. But it will be also about the whole Crypto currencies market, it will be one of the core feature of CoinDash. there is more details about that on the white paper, it's more complex but designed to be easy for everyone to use.

Author: CoinDash HQ
Title: COINDASH - Future of trading - Token Sale 17th July 2017
Body: Hey man! Thanks for your great questions. The copy ICO will work using smart contract where you will send the funds you intend to invest. Next a White List with ICO's addresses will be used in order to track funds movements to trigger the smart contract. At first we will focus on ERC20 token ICO's done with smart contracts as this is becoming the most common ICO way these days. later on we will add different options to enable the CopyICO with other types of ICOs.  Legal work is being done this days to wrap the entire thing however we are working very hard on the platform to avoid any legal complications further down the road

Author: M++
Title: COINDASH - Future of trading - Token Sale 17th July 2017
Body: Guys, ICONOMI and CoinDash are completly different.  ICONOMI is an investment instrument which is very innovative and useful. No doubt about that!  CoinDash is a Social trading platform, where you can manage your portfolio, get insight about your performances, share and compare it to others users. Follow or be followed! Allowing everyone to receive Signal trading, or copy-trade investement automaticly with smart contract.  We will add investement instruments such as ICONOMI on the platform, we want all the useful investements tools to be implemented in CoinDash to make crypto investements simply better and changing the way you trade!

Author: alonmuroch
Title: COINDASH - Future of trading - Token Sale 17th July 2017
Body: Hi, thanks for the question! CoinDash has 3 layers to it, the first 2 are tools (SaaS) like portfolio management and the second is social trading (you can read all about it in our white paper).  The third layer is what we call a marketplace. There you could discover investment opportunities and 3rd party investment instruments(like Melonport for example). It will also include market data from our network. This layer is aimed for more experienced investors who need good tools to evaluate investment opportunities and simplify the actual process in investing in them.

Body: It was said here before they target a maximum cap of 5,000,000 USD but thing might change along the way  My question is do you plan on having a respectable escrow service ? IMHO it is a must, personally I would not invest without one

Author: CoinDash HQ
Title: COINDASH - Future of trading - Token Sale 17th July 2017
Body: And you are a smart man for doing so. I will also never recommend on contributing to a project in the crypto space without implemented escrow service. So you probably understand by my words that we will have an escrow service during the ICO. we just think it is way to soon to decide on it right now as we plan on launching this rocket only in July. Rest assure we will provide you with a very respectable entity to guard the pledged funds

Author: M++
Title: COINDASH - Future of trading - Token Sale 17th July 2017
Body: CoinDash is now part of Coinsilium Group Portfolio! (www.coinsilium.com), That means a lot to us!   Eddy Travia, CEO of Coinsilium: "We are delighted to be investing in Coindash at this early stage of its development. It represents an exciting proposition in the emerging Token space - the so-called Blockchain 2.0. We have been following the progress of Coindash since they won the prestigious Ether Camp hackathon at the end of 2016. Supporting Coindash at this stage is a further affirmation of Coinsilium's determination to be an active and key player in the crypto token economy. We believe that the worldwide trading of cryptocurrencies will continue to grow at a fast pace and we are confident that the Coindash team has the right skillset to establish Coindash as the leading social trading platform of this new multi-billion-dollar market."  Alon Muroch, experienced developer in the blockchain space, CEO and co-founder of Coindash, stated: âWe are very pleased to have Coinsilium join our seed round and look forward to their support and guidance. We are very proud to be part of Coinsiliumâs portfolio of leading blockchain companies. We believe that cryptocurrencies are becoming a new and pertinent asset class and we are working hard for Coindash to become the leading social trading platform in this fast expanding crypto asset market.â   Sources:  https://www.cryptoninjas.net/2017/05/10/coinsilium-invests-75000-blockchain-asset-social-trading-platform-coindash (thanks!)  http://www.nexexchange.com/announcements?newsid=3649996 http://www.finanznachrichten.de/nachrichten-2017-05/40668718-coinsilium-group-limited-investment-in-first-social-trading-crypto-asset-platform-008.htm http://www.bankingtech.com/829752/fintech-funding-round-up-10-may-2017/ http://www.financemagnates.com/cryptocurrency/news/social-trading-startup-coindash-receives-investment-coinsilium/

Author: alonmuroch
Title: COINDASH - Future of trading - Token Sale 17th July 2017
Body: There is always a balance between the amount you want to raise, the value of the token and what your investors get. For us $5M is a good number for funding our activity and give good performance to the investors (which is good for everyone).  I don't see a lot of services like CoinDash out there, that is why we are developing it. Melonport, ICONOMI and Taas are investment instruments (answer for the "how" do I trade). We want to solve the problem that all the newcomers and even old time blockchainers face, which is what to invest in and when. That is why we consider ourselves a platform/ hub for crypto investors where they can find useful tools (portfolio management), social trading and explore investment opportunities and 3rd party investment instruments like ICONOMI/ Melonport/ etc (we actually included an integration with them in our road map, check the white paper).  This space is loosing hundreds of thousands of new users every year because there are simply no good tools to help them trade. They could have otherwise become the biggest advocates of blockchain tech. We intend to make crypto trading much more accessible to them.

Author: CoinDash HQ
Title: COINDASH - Future of trading - Token Sale 17th July 2017
Body: Thanks for your kind words Orpel! we are glad to have you on board  Let my clarify again what CoinDash is all about. We are bringing to the table a tool that was never seen before for portfolio management. each user will have the chance to get an objective picture of his past portfolio performances to be compared with the market stats and others he choses to follow. This tool will enable the user to draw conclusions regarding the amount of risk he/she is taking in his positions, its timing and its investment distribution, all without ever providing the platform with your private keys! The social aspect of the platform goes way further enabling you to follow big traders and to apply the same positions they are taking and even placing a designated amount of funds for automatic copy trading in ICOs using smart contract technology, so even a newbie in the industry can gain from well earned whales knowledge

Author: alonmuroch
Title: COINDASH - Future of trading - Token Sale 17th July 2017
Body: The ICO will serve 2 purposes: 1) funding for the company's activity. Blockchain is so innovative that traditional financing can't really catch up, ICOs are becoming the way to finance blockchain companies. 2) its the most efficient way to build a community around a product/ company, even more so in CoinDash because ICO investors are also the end users.  I didn't want to react to the previous GetGems posts because they were written in a way that frankly does not deserve a response, by online thugs and racists. I was an IOS developer in GetGems, I've joined months after the ICO and always carried myself with respect to the community. Make what you want from it, hope you will not be convinced by a guy who starts his post with "..Jewish bastard..".

Author: CoinDash HQ
Title: COINDASH - Future of trading - Token Sale 17th July 2017
Body: Initial supply and other specs are being finalized as we speak and will be presented to you shortly.  The answer all the latest questions, what CoinDash basically does is create a platform which you can link all your addresses and get an analysis about your portfolio performance since at least 3 months back. As this is a multiple element equation CoinDash is the first real tool to tell you at any moment weather your actions on the portfolio eventually were worth while. On top of that, CoinDash is also a social trading platform where you can share your performance or follow others, doing so you can copy the same positions as the big guns you are following or even copy trade them and invest in the ICO they are taking part with!  The platform has many features which we will be presenting as we go

Author: CoinDash HQ
Title: COINDASH - Future of trading - Token Sale 17th July 2017
Body: Hey CoinDashers! I would like to share with you some of the latest developments from the last few days and a general orientation to where our project is heading so we all can share our ambition and enthusiasm from the future to come.  1. CoinDash's new UI design - Thanks to our talented designers and their amazing work, the new CoinDash beta version has now a great vivid design as you can see in our updated OP images and if you are taking part in our Beta tests. Redesigning our platform is just another step being made by our core and product teams in order to bring you the most intuitive portfolio management tool possible.    2. Beta testing launch - Erlier this week we started 1 on 1 sessions with several of you guys which we chose carfuly to be our first Beta testers. The responses we got so far from the community were even beyond our expectations. We got great feedbcks regarding the platform's functionalities and it's great UI. However, rest assure we do not get distracted and keep on working in order to improve the platform so we can deliver you the premium product we have in mind.  This is a great opportunity to remind you that you could still take part and be one of our testers. If you are intrested see our blog post with all requirements and scope Here  3. Hong Kong & China travel - For the past week our team representatives held many meetings and performances before the local community. As we believe China & Hong Kong are crucial players in the market we were eager to get their impression of the project. During this journey we reached a large number of agreements and understandings regarding future cooperation in connection both with platform development and the coming ICO, many of them with very influential market players in the community.  4. USA travel - Our next stop in spreading the news about CoinDash is going to be the Big Apple. in two weeks from now CoinDash team is going to appear in 4 different states in the USA taking part in many Meetups and several conferences as CONSENSUS and others. As soon as these events occur, you will get their full reports. We truly believe these type of events are the best way for us to present CoinDash to the masses and are sure we will create many strategic partners and connection as a result.   This is all for now! Social bounty campaign is just around the corner as final bounty allocations and platform is being assembled, so stay tuned for further details

Author: CoinDash HQ
Title: COINDASH - Future of trading - Token Sale 17th July 2017
Body: WEBSITE | BLOG |  TWITTER | FACEBOOK | SLACK | TELEGRAM      CoinDash world's first social portfolio management platform Using our groundbreaking platform designed for crypto investors and traders, you can now get a clean analysis and statistics of your portfolio. The platform uses your provided public key, traces back transaction in and out your account and present the user with the whole picture regarding his portfolio management capabilities, portfolio risk levels, distribution ratios and many more. At the same time using the platform each user can follow other traders and investors see their portfolios and risk structures and monitor their aggregated performance. One of the platform's highlights is the CopyICO feature which enables you to use a smart contract interface that will automatically participate in ICOs on your behalf based on investments made by reputable traders you chose to follow, So you'll never miss another ICO again!             CoinDash Tutorial      Crypto currencies market  With Bitcoin dominance diminishing over time Altcoins are gaining more and more attention. One of the biggest use cases for blockchain technology is the ability to create new crypto assets. Such assets are increasingly becoming an alternative investment channel to traditional markets because they enable new models of participation, are tradable 24/7, subject to much less regulation and are easy to create. The past few years showed a dramatic increase in trading volume, market capitalization and the number of projects using crypto tokens.  However, even with recent ROI success rates in the market, investment in crypto currencies is still considered to be a high risk investment. This is due to the fact that such investments requires facing many challenges and a steep learning curve only experienced blockchain users have. The scope of information and its rate is always on the rise, making it very difficult for new comers to get into business and keep with the pace.    Introducing CoinDash platform  Our platform will give any of its users the much needed tools in order to keep track of their performance, to manage the positions and risk levels they wish to to maintain, to get live updates on orders and holdings big traders they chose to follow just did and even to practice some automatic copy trading talking part in every ERC20 based ICO out there. CoinDash's platform will be valuable for each of its users, enabling experienced reputable traders to gain reward from sharing their information to there followers, adding a brand new concept of trade sharing revenue.     Charts and graphs will present current portfolio performances and aggregated results along with many other tools. these are essential in order to manage and interact with crypto assets. They give a deep insight into the performance and status of the userâs investments and help in data driven decision making.  Social interactions are a key part of the crypto world, projects can raise and fall by their community and the network they create. CoinDashâs social trading features remove barriers for new and existing crypto users by letting them follow and copy-trade top investors.  CoinDashâs marketplace is built around opportunity discovery and streamlined trading UX with features like: real-time social trading signals, ICO dashboard, trending assets, real-time market price tables and 3rd party integration.      CoinDash Token CDT  Every feature in the CoinDash platform that gives any financial value to its user will require them to pay a fee with the same notion, users who facilitates the use of a feature which in turn gives financial value to others will be entitled to a reward based on the platform designated token CDT. This creates a creator-consumer relationship between users in the system, not preventing users from being creators and consumers at the same time.  CoinDash's CDT which will be used to pay all fees on the platform is designed to create a direct correlation between the success of the platform and the value of the token. The more people who use the platform, the more fees will be paid, the more CDTs will be bought ultimately pushing the price of them up.  The CDT will be an ERC20 based token making its issuance solely by using a smart contract and allowing it a quick implementation on the Ethereum blockchain and exchanges listing.  CDT Specs and Allocation During CoinDash's Token Sale a total amount of 1,000,000,000 CDT will be created and allocated as follows:  50% - Designated to the Token Sale contributors (1.25% reserved for Wings forecasters) 29% - Minted for future development, users acquisition & marketing 20% - Allocated for early investors, core team & advisors 1% -  Allocated for social bounty campaign  The settled price of 487,500,000 CDT to be sold to the public, during the first phase of our Token sale will be 6,093 CDT per 1 ETH. Using this ETH price we are setting our Token Sale hard Cap on 80,000 ETH representing USD 12 Million     CoinDash's Token Sale      CoinDash's Bounty Program  Visit our Official Bounty thread here Bounty Thread    CoinDash Team   CoinDash Advisors   CoinDash Partners     CoinDash in the media  CoinDash to Host ICO with WINGS on Ethereum Mainnet CoinDash â Creating The First OS For Crypto Assets Tony Tao Antsares chief of business strategy joins CoinDash as an investor and advisor CoinDash wins 50,000$ and 1st place at ether.camp hackathon!
